ygData.subject: Re: Dagger of Marnek n Throwing...
ygData.msgSnippet: Once thrown, it is gone FOREVER. Don t care if you hit or miss
ygData.messageBody:
Once thrown, it is gone FOREVER. Don't care if you hit or miss

"Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" wrote:

> now that i have the brewing skill... that i think can sponsor abit to
> my throwing... hopefully i wont be throwing em away faster than i can
> earn... anyway.. if u miss or something... can u pick back ya thrown
> dagger?
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From:Sereph
> To: sg-everquest@onelist.com
> Sent: Friday, July 09, 1999 5:02 PM
> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Dagger of Marnek n Throwing...
> You can increase your throwing skills, but daggers are damn
> expensive unless you are a magician.
>
> "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" wrote:
>
> > huh? how come cannot increase? jialatz lah... so
> > unfair... anyway... im not talking bout throwing that
> > dagger away lah... just wanna improve my throwing if
> > possible... max out all useful skills whenever i can...
> > thast all... Ni
>
